name: Ocean Planet
description:
Arcade Style Game.

Defend yourself from the enemies that attack your ship. Each of them will have a specific gravity that will affect each piece of your ship. Each piece of your ship will glow a color, when red comes, you have little time before it falls.

You have 60 seconds and three lives to survive. Use your powers to defeat enemies and prevent the weight from dropping your ship.

Remember that your weight also matters!

Take advantage of the power ups, useful for an increase in life or to decrease time.
